name: Super League
description:
So the idea of this game is that you create your own super hero and either go solo or join a league together with your friends. .  But! Now you cant do any of that haha.

You can explore the world by running around or flying!

You can't play with your keyboard and mouse (yet).

To play the "game" you need to connect a PS4 controller via USB (not bluetooth!).
You should be able to use any controller via USB but this is untested. 

If you try another controller. Please let me know if the controls as described below works.

Then the controls are:

Left stick - Movement
Right stick - Camera
L1 (hold) - Run
R1 (hold) - Fly
X - Jump
Circle - Roll
Square - Punch
Triangle - Pick Up

I've done none of the 3D-models. Just experimenting with the engine with free objects.
